description: Use the various levels of spikes to leave at the bottom of your mob farm.
Use the vacuum hopper to suck up items and XP.
Store your XP in the tank
Use redstone to active the drain or shower, to store xp or to dispense.
Cursed droplets and seeds are used to make cursed dirt. Which spawns more mobs.
Use the trash can to get rid of any unwanted loot.
Use the lassos to capture mobs.. for various reasons.
Once you have mastered the mob farm, can you claim your reward.
